title: CES 2017 - Sony OLED A1E 65" and 77"
description:
Abt Electronics talks to Sony about their OLED televisions.

The A1E BRAVIA OLED series offers a totally new entertainment experience with a combination of the superior picture quality of OLED powered by Sony’s 4K HDR Processor X1 Extreme, the world’s first Acoustic Surface™ sound system, and its unique, cutting-edge stand-less form factor. Thanks to OLED’s over 8 million self-illuminating pixels, the A1E series brings a significantly enriched visual experience with unprecedented black levels, rich and lifelike color, dynamic contrast, blur-less image and a wide viewing angle. The 4K HDR Processor X1 Extremeka 65bty01 hero screenfill precisely controls the tremendous number of pixels and extends the capability of OLED to deliver an exquisite 4K HDR picture.


Features: 
- OLED display technology. 8 million self-illuminating pixels
- Acoustic Surface technology
- 4K HDR Processor X1 Extreme
-  TRILUMINOS™ Display
-  4K X-Reality™ PRO
- Voice Search
- Chrome Cast built-in
- Google Home compatibility
- HDR compatible to receive and process the new video standard signal
- HDMI and USB port
- Supports Dolby Vision HDR format.


Learn more at http://www.sony.com/electronics/televisions/a1e-series
